ModMetaData.name: Glitter Weaponry
ModMetaData.author: DetVisor
ModMetaData.description:
This mod expands upon the mysterious lore of the rich and utopian Glitterworlds, adding a set of new deadly laser weapons which cause a new unique hediff and that can only be bought or discovered through quests and rewards. These weapons are stronger than your average charge weapon, making them extremely effective as endgame weapons.
This mod depends on the Athena Framework for some of its features.
Mod is currently in version: 1.4
